code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import API from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ChallengeList(){const[challenges,setChallenges]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();const load=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const res=await API.get('/api/challenges');setChallenges(res.data);}catch{navigate('/login',{replace:true});}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{load();},[]);if(isLoading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading challenges\u2026"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"dashboard-header",children:"Challenges"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dashboard-content",children:challenges.map(c=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:c.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Difficulty: ",c.difficulty]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Base XP: ",c.xp_reward]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attempts: ",c.run_count]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/challenges/${c.id}`,style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"enter-btn",children:"Practice & Earn"})})]},c.id))})]});}
